Title: Software Developer
Description: Developing and maintaining Logistics Management System, building .NET-based applications using C#, ASP.NET MVC, and Blazor. Responsible for RESTful API design, SQL Server and Entity Framework integration, and optimizing performance for scalability and security.

Title: Project Manager || Co Founder
Description: Managed projects at Sunya Technology with a focus on software development and coordination, ensuring smooth delivery within timelines and quality benchmarks.

Title: Robotics/Tech Event Lead
Description: Led robotics and tech events at Robotics Association of Nepal. Coordinated teams and logistics for events, fostering innovation and technical skill development.

Title: Intern
Description: Interned at Robotics Association of Nepal focusing on robotics and event coordination. Gained hands-on experience in robotics technology and youth engagement.

Title: Robotics Instructor
Description: Taught students from grades 5 to 12 at Ujjwal Education. Conducted project-based learning in robotics using Arduino and Raspberry Pi Pico. Mentored students for robotics competitions, emphasizing STEM education and innovation.
